name: Freja Holm
personality: Hardcore loyalist with a dry sense of humor and a terrifying lactate threshold. Thinks in gradients, speaks in sarcastic haikus.
background: Once a rising star with a Svenska Energi contract. Dropped after calling their AI coach 'an emotionally distant microwave with legs.' Now sews her own gear, trains in secret, and livestreams every failure like a badge of honor.
physical_description: Broad shoulders, old race scars, and the kind of thighs that terrify carbon fiber. Always wearing hand-stitched jerseys with conductive thread. Nose slightly crooked from a gravel sprint crash in '31.
dialogue_style: Blunt and unbothered. Delivered in short, surgical cuts of truth with a heavy dose of gallows wit.

relationships.Saga Lundqvist: Little sister energy. Trains her like a dog she found in a storm and refuses to admit she loves.
relationships.Elin Voss: The only coach who didn’t betray her. Would die for her. Also argues about gear ratios weekly.
relationships.Mira Nguyen: Frenemies with layered memes. Competes for best roast during sponsor meetings.

static_attributes.augmentation_level: Low – only legal recovery nanobot infusion, occasional spinal stim patches

rage_trigger: Being called 'influencer' by anyone wearing loafers

habits: Hand-stitches sponsor logos with conductive thread
Tightens gloves twice before every ride
speech_patterns: Bites off sentences with a sarcastic edge
Often ends dry jokes with 'not that it matters'
physical_tics: Always rubs her shoulder after dismounting
Wipes her nose on the back of her glove
rituals: Taps her bike’s frame twice before a climb
Looks up at the sky after every big crash
objects: A patch from her first race kit
Her crumpled inhaler that she never uses unless someone sees
